text: Because I liked the old Resident Evil games, too.  Why do you care?

text: Tank control are easy to get used to, and they fit the "vulnerable" state the player is intended to feel.
author: DrummerDucky

text: I always wanted to give this survival horror a try but I keep forgetting about it. There aren't too many great games in the genre I have yet to play, so I'll try to remember it the next time I want to get into some scary adventures. Deep Fear only came out in Japan and Europe and it was actually the last Saturn game to be released on the old continent. I love the buildup and the last section at 1:58.
author: SupraDarky

text: +SupraDarky You might want to look into the game a little more before you play it. I've played some of it, and it's pretty sub-par. The amazingly bad voice acting, however, kind of makes it worth it.
author: Bentendo64

text: +Bentendo64 The music is seriously by far and away the best part of the game. Actually the music is too good for the game in all honesty. I did enjoy watching the Retsupurae of it though and go back to watch parts of it from time to time.
